library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(RColorBrewer)


## Volunteering

### how many people in Ukraine become volunteers since 24.02

``` {r}

dif <- as.data.frame(read.csv("OXF.csv", sep = ";"))
survey <- data.frame(job=as.factor(dif$V29), volunteer=as.factor(dif$V34))

  
ggplot(survey, aes(x=volunteer)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill=job)) +
   scale_fill_brewer(palette="Pastel1")
  

```

### how many of them lost their jobs
### how many of them came back to work cos out of money
